about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hi, I'm Szymon. I am 18 years old and a programming enthusiast specializing in front-end technologies. Creating clean, efficient, and aesthetic web applications is my main domain.
about.p2: Currently, I am in the 4th grade of the Programming Technician course at the Antoni Kocjan School Complex No. 3. Every day I expand my knowledge and seek new challenges to become a better developer.

education.p3: Zespół Szkół Nr 3 im. Antoniego Kocjana
education.p4: Computer Programming Technician, 4th-year student of Technical Secondary School

items.title: Certificate e.g. 'JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures'
